channel.title: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!
channel.description:
Hi, im having a few porblems (again) I got my server lookin sweet except a few things.
A "null" constantly logs in and out of my server and i dont know how to stop it.
Also in the varrock genral store, one of the p16 features is that the shop keeper kills the assistant, but...it may be hilarious but everytime it happens the server goes really mad.
If anyone has a solution to either, please help me, thx.

item.title: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

uh, he didn’t get it from silab it was in his p16 server already
in p16 there already is an anti null protection

Read full topic
item.source: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!

item.description:
@sarah101 wrote:

he wanst talking about item nulls he was talking about nulls logging in sear for silabs anti null prtection tut it should help

Read full topic

item.title: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!
item.dc:creator: @System79 System79
item.description:
@System79 wrote:

null is also used when someone logs in without username, or if your on a server list, a server list connects to port 43594 as soon as your server comes up and will show up as null. so that might be it.

Read full topic
item.source: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!

item.title: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!
item.dc:creator: @waterslicer waterslicer
item.description:
@waterslicer wrote:

yer the p16 feature has the npc thingy…erm…
search the forums for npc vs. npc and theres a tut that tells you what to put in to make npcs fight just delete all the stuff the tut says you should put in to make npcs fight eachother
and the null thing is good stops the server from crashing or lagging
so they’re not problems just features you dont want
[br][size=1]Posted at: October 27, 2006, 02:50:21 AM[/size][hr]if you want to stop that null thingy just get a new source or delete null.class and null.java but i reccomend you don’t its really helpful

Read full topic
item.source: Attack of the "null", the shop keeper and his assistant!
